message: Take it or leave it, Bob. This is my first and final offer.
Accept this and we can end this quickly!
Let's split it evenly this time. It's the fairest way to go, and we can avoid any more back and forth.
You're trying to be fair, but I'm not getting ripped off!
Let's try this again. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I need a good chunk for myself. It's getting late.
You're not getting the better deal this time, Alice!
I'm getting tired of this. I'm willing to take a bit less than I'd like, but we need to end this soon.
You're not getting the upper hand yet, Alice!
This is it, Bob.  I'm taking the majority, but we're both getting something.  We're running out of time.
You're not getting away with it all, Alice!
